title: A Wicked Show!
post: Recently went to see Wicked on broadway. What a great show! A definite must see if you are in New York.
comments: I would love to see this!

title: Sightseeing in London
post: There are so many sights to see in London. I had such a great time there! What does everyone think is the best sight to see in London?

title: The Best Pizza Ever
post: Just had some pizza from a small restaurant near the colosseum. Hands down the best pizza I ever had!

title: Believe in Magic!
post: Everybody loves Disneyland! Everything there looks great for Halloween. I would definitely recommend going this time of year!
comments: I would love to go here for halloween!

title: The Pyramids
post: How amazing are the Pyramids of Giza?! Who else has seen them?
comments: I saw them last year, it was a great trip!
They are on my bucket list!

title: The Best Restaurant in the World?
post: If anybody loves Tapas, then you have to go to Casa de Tapas in Barcelona! The food was amazing.
